links.title: Bigfry's Blog
links.description: Did you know that American options and European options differ in that American options can be exercised anytime before the expiration date, whereas European options can only be exercised at the expiration date? This means European options are cheaper than American options because American options have more options (pun intended).

messages.body: $AAPL Apple Dividend Stock Analysis: http://dividendvaluebuilder.com/apple-aapl-stock-analysis/ #dividend #growth #technology #dividends #investing #stocks #DVB #AAAMP

links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

Amazon Passes Alphabet To Become Second-Most Valuable Company: http://ow.ly/biCa30j496J $AMZN $GOOGL $AAPL

links.title: Amazon Passes Alphabet To Achieve This Prestigious Position | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Amazon ( AMZN) on Tuesday passed Google-owner Alphabet ( GOOGL) as the world's second most valuable company, with Apple ( AAPL) the only one in its path to the top. Amazon shares rose 2.7% to 1,586.51 on the stock market today, providing it a market valuation of $768 billion.
